attributes.action: agree to the maintenance of a register of reports about unidentified flying objects within the United Kingdom and to publish an outline of each report
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the previous register and helpline are now closed a similar service is required to ensure all sections of the community can fulfil their sense of duty. This is to report sightings of unusual objects in the sky which they believe have violated the airspace of our nations or caused distress and for a register to be kept and published regularly with access freely available.
